prompt_base: photograph of a slender East-Asian woman, long straight black hair in a neat bun, wearing a blue silk qipao and soft pink silk scarf
feature_prompt: subtle subsurface scattering, sharp lines on silk embroidery, realistic silk fabric weave, delicate bone structure
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, exaggerated eyes, flat lighting, low quality, messy bun, neon colors
